p:
In 2009, Keyaerts et al. further investigated both the in vitro and in vivo antiviral activities of CQ against human CoV strain OC43 (HCoV-OC43) in newborn mice.
29 They concluded that CQ interferes with the in vitro replication of HCoV-OC43, and showed 100% survival in newborn mice treated pre-partum with CQ. Their result showed that CQ could be immensely useful against HCoV-OC43.
